channel.title: The first time you did drugs
channel.description:
When was the first time you did drugs? What was it? and how did you feel?
My first time was in gr.7. It was weed, and when i took in the huge breath my throat and stomach burned like a son of a bitch and I ran to the tap.

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

I’ll never do drugs, maybe some alcohol once in a while. I don’t want to end up as a pot head, and would like to see a good future for me; as in not doing drugs. But yet I have a feeling someone will pressure me into it…

Read full topic
item.source: The first time you did drugs

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I just ordered some drugs from this advertisement I saw on Moparscape. It was cheap and the Moparscapers seem to love it.

Let me ask you guys, has there been a reasonable decline in forum activity?

Read full topic
item.source: The first time you did drugs

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:48, topic:188848”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=251644.msg2107737#msg2107737 date=1205472946]
I’m confident that those who don’t get high their first time did not inhale correctly. I got high my first time, and 2 other people that tried it with me for their first time got high (I made sure they inhaled correctly). However, it took ~15 minutes to take affect my and their first times.

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=251644.msg2107268#msg2107268 date=1205457347]

[quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=251644.msg2107245#msg2107245 date=1205456553]

I’ve never done drugs and i never will. I merely consume alcohol every weekend. I started drinking when i was 14.
[/quote]Drinking whiskey in the morning is worse than smoking a bowl or two of marijuana occasionally.
[/quote]I am fully aware of this, but i hate smoking.

Would you eat hash brownies?
[/quote]No, i have no reason to break swedish law and do drugs. I’ll stick to my loveable and tasty alcohol :)[/quote]Smuggling cheap beer from Germany to Sweden is probably not-so-legal.

Read full topic
item.source: The first time you did drugs

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I remember more of my first times.

My first time few times I did not get baked at all. I might have been inhaling the wrong way. This is common. My first time getting truly baked, I was very suprised how good it felt. Next thing I know, I bought a shitload of munchies at the store, and then we were walking home and it felt like I was being sucked into the ground and stuff. I wish I could get those effects still, lol.

Read full topic
item.source: The first time you did drugs

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“Mary|Jane, post:51, topic:188848”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=251644.msg2108625#msg2108625 date=1205537629]
I was 10 my first time. Friend got me a quarter of crippy to share for my birthday. I remember, for some weird reason, I took the hit and my entire body was overcome with warmth.
[/quote]

You don’t get warm, or hot when you smoke weed. You feel smoke in your lungs, thats its.[/quote]

the heat in your lungs could harbor the sensation of warmth all over your body, silly

Read full topic

i cant believe that all these people who say there first time at weed was ok but they just had the munchies… So no one pulled a whitey? no one was sick? find that hard to believe
[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

One day I had to take her home when we were both up in the clouds :D. We started to make out in her room when her father opened the door, so I had to jump out of her window to escape.

That 20 foot fall killed my legs.

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

I got tricked into smoking paper once. My friend rolled it up and it looked like a huge joint, and told me there was no weed in it. Yet, i still attempted to smoke it and it burned like a bitch. I can smoke weed without it even effecting my head; getting light headed.

Read full topic
item.source: The first time you did drugs

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

TheBeanie:

i cant believe that all these people who say there first time at weed was ok but they just had the munchies… So no one pulled a whitey? no one was sick? find that hard to believe

The first time I had a spliff I felt a little “light headed”, and almost light footed, and been fine since. The first time I tried a “bong”, (not a full bong a little shitty small bottle) I felt sick but I knew I wasn’t going to be sick and I wasn’t, although my mates thought differently and kept their distance. Funnily enough, I can’t smoke cigs normally without choking half to death, however even with less than 3:1 in tobaccos favour to weed, I can smoke it fine. Saying that though, I’m a non smoker so I really do doubt anyone who has tried weed that didn’t do it in a spliff first time would have troubles, but I always toked my spliffs slowly.

Read full topic
item.source: The first time you did drugs

item.title: The first time you did drugs
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

I first smoked weed, then shrooms, then i tried sniffing spray paint.

Weed - I’ll always stay with, because it gives you this amazing feeling.

Shrooms - When i feel the need.

Paint - Hell no.

Tried all at the age of 13.

Read full topic
